text:
Is there an easy way to delete the demo-files out of freshly generated site?
I can’t tell which are required and which are only for demo

elements.text:
Is there an easy way to delete the demo-files out of freshly generated site?
I can’t tell which are required and which are only for demo

text: the required files are `config.md` and `index.md` (provided you don't do a custom landing page) as well as the folders that start with `_` . You can remove the rest. If your `__site` folder is "polluted" you can do `serve(clear=true)` which will remove it first then re-build it (you can also safely just manually delete it, it's the same thing)
